name: BLAST-MD
description: A Whatsapp md bot built in NodeJs to make experience better

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: SET YOUR ALIVE MESSAGE FOR THE BOT

AUTO_STATUS_SAVER.description: Automatically saves status of every person and sends in log number.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Fill the value true if you want bot view your Statuses.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put HEROKU APP NAME same as above.

ANTI_BAD_WORD.description: Put words here. If you want it enabled in your bot otherwise leave it blank

LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot send Level up message in chat.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot to read all messages.

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com(optional if u don't wan't then don't put it

MONGODB_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required),change for better experience

THEME.description: Put the theme name you want to use. Avilable themes are BLAST-MD,NEZUKO,LUFFY,GOKU.

WORKTYPE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.

heroku.description: Weather it is on heroku or not
